biotools.summary: Continuously running benchmark project for assessing the quality of protein structure prediction and secondary structure prediction methods. It focuses mainly on homology modeling and protein threading but also includes secondary structure prediction, comparing publicly available webserver output to newly deposited protein structures in the Protein Data Bank.

bioschemas.name: LiveBench
bioschemas.summary: Continuously running benchmark project for assessing the quality of protein structure prediction and secondary structure prediction methods. It focuses mainly on homology modeling and protein threading but also includes secondary structure prediction, comparing publicly available webserver output to newly deposited protein structures in the Protein Data Bank.
